jspecview.util
Class JSpecViewUtils.ScaleData

java.lang.Object
  jspecview.util.JSpecViewUtils.ScaleData
Direct Known Subclasses:
JSpecViewUtils.MultiScaleData
Enclosing class:
JSpecViewUtils
public static class JSpecViewUtils.ScaleData
extends java.lang.Object

The inner class of JSpecViewUtils that stores information about scale and range that JSVPanel needs to to display a graph with a single plot. (For graphs that require multiple plots to be overlayed. An instance of JSpecViewUtils.MultiScaleData may be generated by JSpecViewUtils.generateScaleData( jspecview.util.Coordinate[][], int[], int[], int, int) You do not need to create an instance of this class manually. Instead call the JSpecViewUtils.generateScaleData( jspecview.util.Coordinate[], int, int, int, int).
